mean_cn: adj. 挑衅的，煽动的，刺激的
mean_en: intended to make people angry or upset; intended to make people argue about something
sentence: " "Come to beat me up!" he said, with a provocative gesture."
sentence_trans: “来打我呀！”他带着挑衅的姿势说。
word_etyma: pro向前，在前 + voc呼喊，声，召集 + ative形容词后缀 → 在人面前叫喊 → provocative挑衅的，刺激的
